data.message: I have placed several claim request over the last 4 weeks for RoundPoint Mortgage Company FB pages - I have sent documentation and I have sent claims based on email. I keep getting a auto response telling me that you will contact me in 75 hours. No one has contacted me in 4 weeks - Please help - I have sent copies of my emails to your FB messenger account

replies.message: Hey there. For questions about Pages and ads, please reach out to our team at facebook.com/marketing. -Brittany
